properties.description: It is free to join and use the library and everyone is welcome. Alongside free access to books, computers, casual and study seating, the Library runs a host of free activities for adults and children including Connect Over A Cuppa community coffee morning every Thursday 10am-12noon, there is no charge for refreshments.

properties.description: Everyone is welcome - we are a respectful, welcoming, open-hearted Church. We offer simple refreshments, activities and good company, including on Wednesdays and Fridays at 12.00 noon, a freshly cooked two course hot meal for any who would like it
